name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1572990/extras/Badge_StoryTTest.png?t=1638878299[/img]
You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife, Sei.  There's a problem though.  Sei needs memory components, but of course, getting the money for that is easier said then done, so expect to encounter some shady and unsavory individuals on your way...
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1572990/extras/Badge_FeaturesTTest2.png?t=1638878299[/img]
[list][li][b]Relaxing, Immersive OST![/b]
[/li][li][b]Gorgeous, animated backgrounds and sprites![/b]
[/li][li][b]Gripping, dark narrative![/b]
[/li][li][b]Colorful and well written characters![/b][/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
类型: 休闲

发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 24 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (104) - 此游戏的 104 篇用户评测中有 85% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (104 篇中的 85%) 发布至今
